item.description:
Join us for a free tour of the Smuttynose Brewery in Portsmouth, NH! Meet some new people, learn how beer is made, enjoy good conversation, drink beer, and enjoy some good food afterward... it's a total win.

1. Reserve your FREE ticket here for January 11 @ 5:30pm: http://smuttynosetours-ehometext.eventbrite.com/?rank=0

2. Arrive at the brewery @ 5:15pm for the 5:30 tour.

3. Grab a drink at 6:30pm at the brewery.

4. Dinner @ Flatbreads in Portsmouth, NH at 8pm.

If you can only join us for dinner, that's OK too... though either way, you *** Must RSVP and let me know if you will be joining us at Flatbreads after so I can include you in the reservation. ***

Bring friends... the more the merrier!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll start at the Smuttynose Brewery at 5:15 (tour starts 5:30), then go for dinner and drinks at Flatbread at 8:00pm
item.name: Smuttynose Brewery Tour + Night Out In Portsmouth
